entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
